item.description:
The Brettl-Hupfers will be at our lodge in Bartlett, NH the weekend of January 22-24th for what is one of the best weekends of the year! The lodge is filling up fast so if you haven't made it up yet and have been thinking about it this might be the time to come up. For this particular weekend we are only accepting RSVP's for people who can stay 2 nights.

We are located only 2 miles from Attitash and close to Wildcat, Cranmore, Black, and Bretton Woods right in the heart of North Conway and about 40 minutes from Sunday River.

Lodging is $20/night and we are offering a dinner (optional) on Saturday night consisting of meatloaf with a soup, veggie, and potato's, and eggplant stacks as a veggie option. We will also be getting a sheet cake for desert. The charge for dinner including desert will be $16. Please indicate in your RSVP if you would like dinner and specify meat or veggie.

Full directions and information will be provided to those who RSVP.

Sign up soon!
item.name: Weekend at the Bretts, January 22 - 24th, 2010
